welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sakura, Japan! Get ready to experience the enchanting beauty of cherry blossoms, traditional tea ceremonies, and the rich history of this charming city. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Sakura has to offer.

restaurants.name: 正嗣氏家店
restaurants.description: 正嗣氏家店 is a dumpling restaurant located in さくら市.

restaurants.name: ラーメン寿々㐂
restaurants.description: ラーメン寿々㐂 is a ramen restaurant located in さくら市.

restaurants.name: Uobei (魚べい)
restaurants.description: Uobei (魚べい) is a sushi restaurant located in さくら市.

restaurants.name: 中華そば みやこ家
restaurants.description: 中華そば みやこ家 is a ramen restaurant located in さくら市.

restaurants.name: 登竜 氏家店
restaurants.description: 登竜 氏家店 is a ramen restaurant located in さくら市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Narita International Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Narita International Airport, primarily used by low-cost carriers and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal of Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 2 hours per session.
